attributes.action: Reinstate Hand Gun licences for Target Shooters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ban on hand gun ownership has not taken hand guns off the streets & has actually increased the number of illegal guns in circulation & shootings taking place, & has only penalised the legitimate target shooter & damaged the shooting industry.
The original ban was part of the governments covert plan for the control of the civilian population (by banning all types of guns, air weapons, Long bows & Cross bows (weapons to be banned as stated by my MP at the time of lobbying prior to the ban)(& discussed with other countries)
The Dunblane incident was the next excuse that the government wanted to bring in more restrictions on owning weapons, & any further incidents will result in the next ban being implimented. The ownership of hand guns could be made safe by passing a law that allowed hand guns to be owned for target shooting & kept at ones home, but with the ammunition having to be purchased & used at a gun club so that no ammunition for hand guns was kept at any persons home address. A gun without ammunition is less dangerous than a knife or metal bar. The hand gun ban was a no brainer by the government & has not stopped the criminal elements from obtaining guns.
